span.div: Bainville School Office Will Be Closed: 4-9 thru 4-13
span.p: "In case you forgot to remind yourself this morning.
Your smile lights up a room. Your mind is cool.
You are doing a great job."

a.title: Go to comments for Daily Announcement Highlights

span.p: All School Activities Suspended until Further Notice.
"Don't count the days - Make the days count"

span.span: For the latest in game schedules, check the Calendar at the top of the page.

a.title: Go to comments for AD Wilson's Updates

span.span: If you'd like to access your student(s)' grades, the district can provide you access to the Parent Portal. There you will find information about your child(ren)'s classes, grades and more. If you are new this year, or have forgotten your access code, call the school for help.

a.title: Go to comments for Parent Infinite Campus Access

strong.em: Please click hereto access the OFFICIAL CDC Page for the Coronavirus
The page includeshow to protect yourself, how to identify if you are sick, as well as other resources.
Congratulations to the Bainville School Community for your support for the Roosevelt Medical Center. Your contribution of over $800 had the distinction of being the most among the area schools!

em.span: Welcome to our school website. If you are new here, please take time to find forms, the breakfast/lunch menu, and some links that may be of use to you.

Bainville Public School is pleased to have many programs in place for students. From our multi-tiered systems of support for students (MTSS) to our mentoring program for new teachers, Bainville's purpose is to give our students a quality education.

We offer many activities and athletic options for students as they progress through their education.Students can choose from golf, baskeball, football, track, cross country, BPA,art clubor FFA. Our students have a variety of options to remain active and develop their skills.
We are proud that we have many parents involved: whetherclassroom volunteers, coaches or employmentin support roles in the district; parents are welcome at BPS.

p.span: AtBainville Public Schools, we have made it our mission to educate all students for lifelong success. Our vision is that all students will become responsible, caring, and productive citizens of society in a setting where: students, parents, staff, and community members share responsibility; district leadership motivates people, policies, and decisions; and all resources are used effectively and efficiently.

div.span: Thank you for visiting our website!

span.div: You can also visit us on Facebook!
This institution is an equal opportunity provider.
Bainville Public School is working to make its website completely ADA compliant
